scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ngc
scripts.pack:osx: ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf ./dist/*.tgz && cd dist && npm pack && cp *.tgz ../../_dist && cp *.tgz ../../_dist/hb42-lib-client-latest.tgz && cd ..
scripts.pack:win: ./node_modules/.bin/rimraf ./dist/*.tgz && cd dist && npm pack && copy *.tgz ../../_dist && copy *.tgz ../../_dist/hb42-lib-client-latest.tgz && cd ..
scripts.commit: git add -A ./lib && git commit -m "publish npm package" ./lib
scripts.make: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm run pack
